popover.title: Popover
popover.subtitle: Popup component for displaying additional content with positioning, triggers and customization support

basic.title: Basic Example
basic.description: Standard popover with login form. Opens on button click. Requires specifying trigger element via `rootEl` property

placement.title: Positioning
placement.description: Popover can be positioned relative to trigger element in four directions: `top`, `bottom`, `left`, `right`. Alignment is controlled via `align` property

trigger.title: Triggers
trigger.description: Popover can open on click (`trigger="click"`) or hover (`trigger="hover"`). For hover trigger you can configure delays via `showDelay` and `hideDelay` properties

arrow.title: Arrow
arrow.description: Popover can be displayed with or without an arrow pointing to trigger element. Controlled via `arrow` property

triggerSlot.title: Custom Trigger
triggerSlot.description: Using `trigger` slot for custom trigger element. Slot receives: `isOpen` (open state), `open` (open function), `close` (close function). Allows full control over trigger look and behavior

template.title: Header and Footer Template
template.description: Popover with `header` and `footer` slots for structured content. Header is displayed at the top, footer at the bottom

argTypes.title: Popover title displayed at the top
argTypes.rootEl: Element relative to which popover is positioned (HTMLElement or Vue component)
argTypes.placement: Popover position relative to element: bottom, top, left, right
argTypes.trigger: Popover opening method: click or hover
argTypes.offset: Spacing in pixels between element and popover
argTypes.sameWidth: Set popover width equal to trigger element width
argTypes.boundaryPadding: Padding in pixels from viewport bounds to prevent popover from going off screen
argTypes.zIndex: Z-index for popover (used to control stacking order)
argTypes.maxHeight: Maximum popover height in pixels (number) or string with units
argTypes.maxWidth: Maximum popover width in pixels (number) or string with units
argTypes.teleportTo: Selector or element to which popover is teleported (default "body", false - no teleport)
argTypes.restoreFocus: Restore focus to trigger element after popover closes
argTypes.animation: Type of appearance/disappearance animation: zoom or opacity
argTypes.arrow: Show arrow pointing to trigger element
argTypes.showDelay: Delay in milliseconds before showing popover (for trigger="hover")
argTypes.hideDelay: Delay in milliseconds before hiding popover (for trigger="hover")
argTypes.durationEnter: Duration of appearance animation in milliseconds
argTypes.durationLeave: Duration of disappearance animation in milliseconds
argTypes.hide: Event fired when popover is hidden
argTypes.show: Event fired when popover is shown
argTypes.header: Slot for popover header (displayed at the top)
argTypes.footer: Slot for popover footer (displayed at the bottom)
argTypes.trigger: Slot for custom trigger element. Receives: isOpen (state), open (open), close (close)
